comment: A Drayton Manor Theme Park roller coaster is shown accelerating downwards vertically on a red colored track with several visible people making either happy , excited or scared faces .
A person dressed like a devil is trying to scare a woman .
A smiling blond young woman in a purple sweater holds a faux alligator up to another blond young woman who pretends to be scared .
A scared-looking child with big eyes is in a highchair looking at the camera while several people are moving around in the background .
A young girl in a light blue dress scares away a flock of seagulls as she runs towards them on the shoreline of a beach .
A lady scared about balancing on a rope on a shore .
Roommate is jumping on friends bed in an attempt to scare him .
A woman with a scared look on her face preparing for roller coaster ride .
A woman is a little scared because a bird landed on her shoulder while she was in the warehouse .
A boy in a Redskins jersey jumps up to scare a patch of pumpkins .
a girl with a blue shirt looking scared with two other children behind her
Black children are playing a game , perhaps meant to scare someone - one with orange hands and seeing to be coming to get you as others smile in the background .
A tan and white dog looks scared while splashing in the water .
A woman in a blue sporty skirt and tank top looking scared in a park .
A little girl is sitting outside on a set of steps with her hands covering her face as if she is sad or scared .
Two girls running scared in the beach while the birds follow them .
A crazy guys dressed like a devil posing a weird expression which scares lot of people .
A man in a wheelchair sits in front of a mural of a scared woman .
A girl looks at a bug on her finger and looks scared .
A man is standing on two ladders , looking scared .
One young man is holding a hammer above a scared young man while another watches .
A scared kid is riding a horse .
